column5: Hey all, I thought I saw a thread somewhere around here for fishing partners. Can't find it now...  Anyway, I'm from Hamilton mountain, just looking for a buddy or some buddies to go out and well of course catch some fish, I am not a float or fly fisherman as I don't have the equipment, but I would like to catch any species.
im always down. hit me up when walleye/pike and bass season starts. im in east hamilton

Hey CW! I wanted to respond because I am glad that you have found this site and didn't want you to think that we are not looking for fishing partners, or are a bunch of snobby terds. Keep an eye open for various fishing activities that members run, some for charity and some for the sake of getting together. If you are not a float or fly guy, you are okay by me and welcome to marry my sister anytime! (Marry your sister Sir? Absolutely! you should hear the noise she makes when she eats a boiled egg. Bonus points for anyone that can identify that exchange). Anyway, welcome and keep your eyes peeled for future get togethers. Jim
Come down to the Desjardin canal on Sun. A bunch of us will be fishin carp and some other species too.
and who says we are not a dating site.  G.
Lots of friendly guys here are from Hamilton. You'll have no problems finding some fishing buddies. If you are looking for something more than friends, only Gerritt can help you there.
yup, i fish the harbour all through the spring summer and fall! welcome to join me anytime down there
Swallowing an egg with one gulp. This site is becoming to Funny. I think I got that correct Radnine.
Wouldnt mind learning a thing or two for carp  Always like to epand my knowledge for fishing.
Wow you guys have fishing Friends    I cant get past Part Time, occasional, Long Distance pretend Friends  so someone can have a fishing friend

i found my purchase of a new stratos fishing boat helped me make friends.  if you see the blue and white excusrion at the bay wave me over, always room for one more. (but the guys from shore seem to catch more than i do???)

i found my purchase of a new stratos fishing boat helped me make friends.  if you see the blue and white excusrion at the bay wave me over, always room for one more. (but the guys from shore seem to catch more than i do???)
Who said anything about dating? We are going straight to marriage.   dsn
Yeah I can't wait until they start-up my end of the GTA.   DSN
